definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Finland is also home to the world's longest-running rock festival, Ruisrock.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰还是世界上持续时间最长的摇滚节的发源地。

sentences.english: Huanghe is the cradle of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 黄河是中国文化的发源地。

sentences.english: Setele: Korriban, ancient birth place of the Sith.
sentences.chinese: 柯瑞班，古老的西斯发源地。

sentences.english: New Orleans is the home of French cuisine in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，纽奥尔良是法国菜的发源地。

sentences.english: As the nuclear calcium storage pool, the nuclear envelope is the original site that generating nuclear calcium signals.
sentences.chinese: 作为核钙的贮存库，核被是核钙信号的发源地。

sentences.english: Xing'an have originated in the Xiangjiang River in Guangxi, length 226 km.
sentences.chinese: 境内有发源于广西兴安的湘江干流，全长226公里。

sentences.english: China is the origin and distribution center of rhododendrons.
sentences.chinese: 我国是杜鹃花的发源地和分布中心。

sentences.english: Science was at the root of nineteenth-century and early twentieth-century racism.
sentences.chinese: 科学发源于19世纪和20世纪早期。

sentences.english: That river, - who shall say exactly whence it came, and whither it goes?
sentences.chinese: 那河，谁能说清何时发源和流往何处？

sentences.english: To originate in hair Zhuozhang Hatoyama, to the east, into the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 浊漳河就发源于发鸠山，向东流去，注入黄河。

sentences.english: Hanzhengjie is the birthplace of Hankou, it is also one of the culture cradle of Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 汉正街是汉口的发源地，也是武汉市文化的摇篮之一。

sentences.english: Provence is the home of perfumery.
sentences.chinese: 普罗旺斯是香水业的发源地。

sentences.english: Archaeological discovery has shown that Beijing is a cradle of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 考古发掘表明，北京是中华民族的发源地之一。

sentences.english: Hakka culture in origin, the Hakka people of the Andean birth.
sentences.chinese: 客家文化在此发源，客家民系于斯诞生。

sentences.english: China and India are both countries with ancient civilization.
sentences.chinese: 中国和印度同为世界四大古文明的发源地。

sentences.english: Shanghai is Chinese piano industry headstream , history having close century so far already.
sentences.chinese: 上海是中国钢琴工业的发源地，至今已有近百年历史。

definition: to give rise to (sth good)/to emanate from
the birthplace (of sth good)/the cradle (e.g. of art)
lit. floating wine goblets on a stream/the origin (of some phenomenon)
Mount Geladaindong or Geladandong in Qinghai (6621 m), the main peak of the Tanggula mountain range 唐古拉山脈|唐古拉山脉[Tang2 gu3 la1 shan1 mai4]
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
